alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 2:58AM MDT until March 16 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet above 8000 feet, substantially lower accumulations below 8000 feet. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on mountain routes including the SR-20 Summit, SR-143 Summit, SR- 153 Summit, and US-89 between Zion National Park and SR-12.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
